name: Last Minute (N0vaKnight, Curruff, tehabruh, nickaronii)
description:
A lab just hired a new intern. Her name was Sasha. After the scientist left the room, Sasha saw a big red button. It had to be pressed. Not knowing what it did, Sasha pressed it. The time machine behind her turned on. Sasha then realized what she had done. She had to turn off the time machine before it was too late. Play as Sasha in this thrilling escape room, and turn off the machine, or be forever in a loop.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys - Move

Click - Pickup

Space - Use item

Coder - NovaKnight

Artist - tehabruh

Composer - Curruff

Designer - nickaronii
